Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE seguros.v1parcelasvg SET SIT_REGISTRO = '2', TIMESTAMP = CURRENT TIMESTAMP, OCORR_HISTORICO = (SELECT MAX(OCORR_HISTORICO) FROM SEGUROS.PARCELA_HISTORICO WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND NUM_ENDOSSO = :NUM_ENDOSSO AND NUM_PARCELA = :NUM_PARCELA) WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND NUM_ENDOSSO = :NUM_ENDOSSO AND NUM_PARCELA = :NUM_PARCELA END SQL
